markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Magic Wand](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3050)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=731" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 282 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This baton is about a foot long and contains a single spell. The appearance typically relates to the spell within.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You Cast the Spell at the indicated level.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of the spell at the listed rank.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
